title: Switzerland
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131003093917/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Geography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131003093917/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Geography) : Switzerland**

Small European country located in the Alps, in the heart of Europe. Surrounded by the European Union, although not a part of it.

Switzerland has around seven million inhabitants, and four official languages.  
The capital is Bern, but Zürich is the biggest city. Other large cities include Lucerne, Basel, Geneva, Lausanne, etc.
